[{"id":"9f178afc-6d3b-41ac-afc0-765906eba950","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Class Documentation: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallManager","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"988b19a7-3a9c-4fec-ac3c-f89b34183c5f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the central coordinator for tracking function and method invocations during the analysis process. In a static analysis environment, simply knowing a function is defined is insufficient; the engine must track every specific site where that function is called to understand data flow.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b0a2dd0b-b5ad-457d-bbf7-16cf4fbf7c82","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" records these calls, organizes them by namespace, and ensures they are ordered chronologically using a sequence-based heap.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3c7c368f-2633-4464-b4f8-46067ca04292","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"ea595ae8-1353-46a1-85c1-6856fd7b52d1","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Attributes","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b235d412-32a8-4141-b1bb-eb794ef77a6d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"calls","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"dict","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): The primary registry. Keys are namespaces (the scope where the call occurs), and values are heaps containing ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" objects.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"73d55fcb-dec9-4c48-8b5d-c7bacf6767f5","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"seq","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"int","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): A global sequence counter used to maintain the absolute order of calls, ensuring that calls occurring on the same line or in rapid succession are tracked in their original execution order.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3ce49451-6f41-4c1f-95e5-3a150debb49c","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"d7736338-87e7-4db7-9cb1-71a7a7976df5","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Methods","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2192fcfa-a8c8-4a2a-8cae-118922c5b146","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"__init__()

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Initializes the manager with an empty call registry and resets the global sequence counter to zero.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4abfb725-8b23-4056-ac2c-2631b1ba724a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"call(row, func_name, ns, params, inherit=False)

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Registers a new function call event.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"91f851b7-ddd0-4584-93cd-04e8a2fe3111","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"row","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The source code line number where the call occurs.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c84a31d9-9fcf-47ac-a825-1807c4c6f923","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"func_name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The name of the function or method being invoked.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f118458e-cecd-46ae-bdce-e6c7ad281e8e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ns","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The namespace (scope) from which the call is being made.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"19b0ddc4-258f-4d3d-a068-c7a197072ea4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"params","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": A list of arguments passed to the function.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"83ddddcc-3a8d-4aa4-9f80-6643b91cd4c4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"inherit","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": A boolean flag indicating if the call involves inherited method resolution.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d4ef462d-61b7-4a29-858b-11cf1f362758","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Internal Logic","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The method processes the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"params","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to unify keyword arguments (stored as dictionaries) and positional arguments. It then creates a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and pushes it into a heap-ordered list for that specific namespace.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"e7984e61-75a1-421b-bbfc-8c0d366aeafc","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"get(ns)

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Retrieves the ordered list (heap) of all function calls registered within a specific namespace.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1b54c696-ec3c-4dd2-ae77-629666f192f7","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"dd44d2cf-18e1-45c4-b0e4-84bb5c88640c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7798cb32-1604-4e42-a53f-3e0dc195747e","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is used by the analyzer every time it encounters a function call expression in the AST.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6a300612-f200-4c15-95e7-85bdb165d37a","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"from calls import CallManager

# 1. Setup the manager
call_mgr = CallManager()

# 2. Register a call: validate_user("admin", timeout=30) at line 45
# Scope: 'app.auth'
call_mgr.call(
    row=45,
    func_name="validate_user",
    ns="app.auth",
    params=["admin", {"timeout": 30}]
)

# 3. Retrieve calls for a specific scope to analyze data flow
pending_calls = call_mgr.get("app.auth")
while pending_calls:
    import heapq
    # Heaps ensure we get the calls in the order they were registered
    latest_call = heapq.heappop(pending_calls)
    print(f"Line {latest_call.row}: Calling {latest_call.func_name}")","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6575af9c-78b7-46a0-9aca-5af774266984","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6b7e70e9-0184-4609-8494-f12634668ae6","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Sequence Integrity","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By using an internal ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"seq","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" counter, the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ensures that calls are ordered exactly as they were discovered, even if multiple calls exist on the same line (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"func_a(func_b())","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"176ce7ca-6493-4845-b63c-137ccf414322","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Argument Normalization","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method automatically identifies dictionary-based parameters as keyword arguments and separates them from positional arguments, preparing the data for the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NamePointer","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" resolution system.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1bd69772-4609-46fc-ba86-82dc4332952b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Heap-Based Efficiency","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Storing calls in a heap within each namespace allows the analyzer to efficiently retrieve calls in chronological order, which is vital for maintaining an accurate execution trace during path traversal.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6406a506-d4fb-4fb5-9f99-31164dd220c6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
